title: When My Soul Bleeds Words
description: When My Soul Bleeds Words is more than just another hipster poetry book. Look through the eyes of a young woman struggling to find peace and clarity in the chaos of her human shell. Venture into a realm which few dare to acknowledge, let alone enter-the battlefield of the soul. Within this artfully symbolic, illustrated poetry collection you will see more than just poems. You will experience a kaleidoscope of raw, uncensored human emotion, from the perspective of a Christian fighting bipolar symptoms. Covering everything from depression, to joy, lust, and redemption, When My Soul Bleeds Words will connect you to the brutally honest essence of what it means to be human. Readers are saying... ..".If you enjoy deep poetry that expresses real emotions, you'll love this." "A vulnerable, raw, yet hopeful look into the heart of the author as she pens down many of the hurts we all push down yet crave for others to understand."
author: Leah Kathryn Oxendine
